careerSummary: I am an accomplished professional with 5 years experience in customer service and more than 10 years of programming experience in PHP, C# and various Javascript frameworks.

workExperiences.title: Programmer Analyst
workExperiences.details: Worked with Northern Health Authority programmers to port an existing contract management software to .NET Core. Some of my responsibilities and contribution during the project include:
items: Implemented software features and CRUD functionality
Built custom software solutions
Fixed countless bugs and resolved software issues
Applied Island Health CSS using Gulp and PostCSS
Implement code-first migrations
Provided mentoring to colleagues and shared coding best practices
Promoted proper tagging of commits to link them with TFS tickets
Improved team's Git workflow
Weekly site deployment on Island Health

workExperiences.title: Senior Web Programmer
items: Integrated Paypal and Stripe on SaaS billing system
Ported PHP calendar to Javascript
Applied premium themes to custom studio website templating system
Updated invoicing system
Migrated Saas email notifications to MailChimp and Mandrill
Updated Manager reporting tools
Switched development environments to Vagrant
Migrated company repositories to Bitbucket and improved Development Team's Git workflow

workExperiences.title: Freelance Web Developer
items: Converted PSD layouts to pixel-perfect HTML/CSS
Built custom scripting solutions for clients
Completed photo restoration and graphic editing projects using Photoshop
Fixed various web-related projects on Freelancer.com

workExperiences.title: Customer Service Representative
items: Provided prompt and friendly response to member inquiries through chat and email
Managed a high-volume workload within a deadline-driven environment
Consistently met company performance benchmarks in all areas (knowledge, courtesy, transaction length)
Received several commendations such as "Employee of the month" and "Perfect attendance" on multiple occasions
Completed voluntary customer service trainings to learn ways to enhance customer satisfaction and improve productivity

skills: Alpinejs, Sveltejs, Vuejs, Reactjs, Angularjs, Meteorjs, jQuery, Mootools
Stripe, Paypal, Authorize.net, Mailchimp, Mandrill, Google API

schools.course: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
